overview: Ms. Dana Cohen brings to her current position operational, business and management experience in the molecular diagnostics and biotech industries. Ms. Cohen previously managed TKsignal, a company specializing in cancer radio-imaging markers and drug development. Prior to that, she served as Marketing & Sales Manager at Pronto Diagnostics & Savyon Diagnostics, where she was involved in developing and marketing diagnostic kits to the clinical and research market for genetic disease, carrier screening, prenatal testing, cancer predisposition, and differential diagnosis. Ms. Cohen holds an MSc from the Hebrew University of Jerusalem
